data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wei, Jiu-Feng, Feng, Ji-Nian (2012): A new species of Pseudaulacaspis MacGillivray, 1921 from China (Hemiptera, Coccoidea, Diaspididae) with a key to Chinese species. ZooKeys 210: 9-17, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.210.3122, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.210.3122
